channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed chief signals in Jackson Hole that weak August jobs data would punch ticket to half-point rate cut
item.description: Chair Jerome Powell strikes dramatic rate-cut tone cuts while keeping all options on Fed‚Äôs table.

item.title: Microsoft plans September cybersecurity event to discuss changes after CrowdStrike outage
item.description: Industry participants will discuss the idea of relying more on a safer part of Windows than the privileged kernel mode that CrowdStrike software uses.

item.title: CN workers threaten strike, vow to fight Canada move to end rail shutdown
item.description: The union representing workers at Canadian National Railway said on Friday they would strike next week. A lockout at rival CPKC has yet to be lifted.

item.title: Whoops! You missed the gold boom.
item.description: If you think your stocks have been doing well this year, look at gold.

item.title: U.S. will again offer free at-home Covid tests starting in late September
item.description: Americans will soon be able to use COVIDtests.gov to request four free tests, Biden administration officials said.

item.title: Bank of England's Bailey: 'More restrictive policy' could still be needed due to labor market shocks
item.description: Bailey will say he currently places more weight on "the degree of restriction we have in place today easing off over time."

item.title: Big new contracts and revenue growth have these stocks moving

item.title: DOJ sues software firm RealPage for allegedly helping landlords collude to keep rents high
item.description: The DOJ accused RealPage of unlawfully scheming to undermine competition among landlords and create a monopoly that harms millions of renters.

item.title: Fed Chair Powell indicates interest rate cuts ahead: 'The time has come for policy to adjust'
item.description: Powell laid the groundwork for interest rate cuts ahead, though he declined to provide exact indications on timing or extent.

item.title: Delta chief operations officer departing for another company after just over a year on the job
item.description: Delta's COO Mike Spanos, a company outsider, was hired in May 2023.

item.title: Body of final person missing from sunken superyacht found off Sicily
item.description: Divers on Friday retrieved the body of the final missing person who was on a superyacht that sank off the coast of Northern Italy.

item.title: Watch live: Fed Chair Jerome Powell speaks from Jackson Hole conference
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell delivers his keynote speech at 10 a.m. on Friday for the central bank's annual retreat in Jackson Hole, Wyoming.

item.title: Trump could cash out his DJT stock within weeks. Here's what happens if he sells
item.description: Trump Media made its debut on the Nasdaq under the ticker DJT in late March, following a lengthy merger with a special purpose acquisition company.
